description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国军事人物，中国人民解放军中将。曾任国防科技大学校长，2008年当选第十一届全国政协常务委员。
description.en: A military figure of the People's Republic of China and a lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army. He formerly served as the President of the National University of Defense Technology and was elected as a Standing Committee member of the 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省苏州市下辖的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Suzhou, Jiangsu province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A country in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军衔，位于上将之下、少将之上。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army, ranking below general and above major general.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省长沙市，是中国共产党中央军事委员会直属的综合性研究型全国重点大学。
description.en: Located in Changsha, Hunan, China, it is a comprehensive research-oriented national key university directly under the Central Military Commission of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会
en: 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的第十一届全国委员会，任期为2008年至2013年。
description.en: The 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, with a term from 2008 to 2013.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会教育科学文化卫生体育委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会教育科学文化卫生体育委员会
en: Committee for Education, Science, Culture, Health and Sports of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宇航科学技术工作者的学术性群众团体。
description.en: An academic and public organization for astronautical science and technology professionals in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会
en: 16th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十六次全国代表大会选举产生的中央委员会，任期为2002年11月至2007年10月。
description.en: The Central Committee elected by the 16th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party, serving from November 2002 to October 2007.

description.zh-cn: 温熙森出生于江苏常熟。
description.en: Wen Xisen was born in Changshu, Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 2000年，温熙森被授予中国人民解放军中将军衔。
description.en: In 2000, Wen Xisen was awarded the rank of Lieutenant General in the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学

description.zh-cn: 温熙森曾担任国防科技大学校长。
description.en: Wen Xisen served as the President of the National University of Defense Technology.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 2008年，温熙森当选第十一届全国政协常务委员。
description.en: In 2008, Wen Xisen was elected as a Standing Committee member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会教育科学文化卫生体育委员会

description.zh-cn: 温熙森担任全国政协教科文卫体委员会专委。
description.en: Wen Xisen served as a special committee member of the CPPCC's Committee for Education, Science, Culture, Health and Sports.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，温熙森是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to category information, Wen Xisen is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，温熙森是中国共产党第十六届中央委员会候补委员。
description.en: According to category information, Wen Xisen was an alternate member of the 16th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，温熙森是中国宇航学会常务理事。
description.en: According to category information, Wen Xisen was a standing council member of the Chinese Society of Astronautics.
